subject: English
atomic_concept: We use our nose to smell and breathe.

nested_learning.intuition: The nose helps us smell things.
nested_learning.concept: We smell and breathe using our nose.
nested_learning.example: I smell a flower with my nose.
nested_learning.application: Close one nostril and breathe slowly.

misconception_fit: We do not smell with our ears.
Nose is not used to see.
socratic_prompts: Which body part helps you smell?
Can you breathe without using your nose?

difficulty_modes.medium: We use our nose to smell and breathe.
difficulty_modes.hard: The nose helps us smell and take in air.
difficulty_modes.master: The nose is a sense organ used for smelling and breathing.
